channel.title: Make items dropable?
channel.description: Ok so I'm using a Pi/dspk source and well server sided I went to dropitem.java and config.java and I got two errors from them I've tried removing the statement that you can't drop items everywhere in the game and left the statement that you can't drop items in duel arena but I Also was wandering how can I make people drop items in Wilderness except if your fighting I am using runefx by rash that's the source I'm using

item.title: Make items dropable?
item.dc:creator: @Dextrell Dextrell
item.description:
@Dextrell wrote:

Ok so I’m using a Pi/dspk source and well server sided I went to dropitem.java and config.java and I got two errors from them I’ve tried removing the statement that you can’t drop items everywhere in the game and left the statement that you can’t drop items in duel arena but I Also was wandering how can I make people drop items in Wilderness except if your fighting I am using runefx by rash that’s the source I’m using

Read full topic
